name: Tod and Leben - A short furry horror game
name_original: Tod and Leben - A short furry horror game
description:
A village where animals talk and a secret to discover in the dark forest: There is a sorcerer hidden in the forest.

Features:  

  • Game made with Rpg Maker MV and Paint.net 
  • This is a adventure/horror game.
  • This game is not made by a child.
  • This game can be completed until your grandmother.
  • An incredible story of only 5 minutes.
  • A lot of cookies.
  • 4 finals.
  • There are not microtransactions and it's free!

Download now and enjoy this little gem!

Download game in spanish: https://adrianblz.itch.io/tod-y-leben
